data.name: LandingPara2
data.value: Thank you for creating an account on the Solar Network. We're excited to have you join our community!

data.name: LandingPara3
data.value: To access all features and ensure the security of your account, please confirm your registration by clicking the button below:

data.name: LandingPara4
data.value: If you didn't create this account, please ignore this email.

data.name: AccountDeletionPara2
data.value: We've received a request to delete your Solar Network account. We're sorry to see you go.

data.name: AccountDeletionPara3
data.value: To confirm your account deletion, please click the button below. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

data.name: AccountDeletionPara4
data.value: If you did not request to delete your account, please ignore this email or contact our support team immediately.

data.name: PasswordResetPara2
data.value: We recieved a request to reset your Solar Network account password.

data.name: PasswordResetPara3
data.value: You can click the button below to continue reset your password.

data.name: PasswordResetPara4
data.value: If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email safety.

data.name: VerificationPara2
data.value: Thank you for creating an account on the Solar Network. We're excited to have you join our community!

data.name: VerificationPara3
data.value: To verify your email address and access all features of your account, please use the verification code below:

data.name: VerificationPara4
data.value: This code will expire in 30 minutes. Please enter it on the verification page to complete your registration.

data.name: VerificationPara5
data.value: If you didn't create this account, please ignore this email.

data.name: ContactVerificationPara2
data.value: Thank you for updating your contact information on the Solar Network. To ensure your account security, we need to verify this change.

data.name: ContactVerificationPara3
data.value: Please click the button below to verify your contact information:

data.name: ContactVerificationPara4
data.value: If you didn't request this change, please contact our support team immediately.
